description: Try our easy to follow Banana Breakfast Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana Breakfast Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir banana mixture into dry ingredients and mix until well combined. Using 2 tbs of mixture for each biscuit, spoon onto trays and press into a round shape. Repeat with remaining mixture, leaving a 5cm space between each. Scatter with extra hemp seeds. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until edges are slightly browned. Cool on trays then store in an airtight container for up to 5 days.
